messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’m keeping my eyes open for crime.
Anyone arousing suspicion here?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Now, just hold on. I didn’t say that
you were shady looking!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Don’t go hanging out with any
shady-looking characters! You hear?
messages.TRMSG_NOT_NIGHT_UNUSED:
Patrolling night and day sure is
exhausting... Yawn...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Any shady-looking characters around?
I’m always on the lookout for punks.Expecting some shady dude to actually
pop up... Does that make me weird?
